typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		country as string,
		country_code as string,
		continent as string,
		population as integer,
		indicator as string,
		daily_count as integer,
		date as date,
		rate_14_day as string,
		source as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> sourcecasesanddeathdata
source(output(
		country as string,
		country_code_2_digit as string,
		country_code_3_digit as string,
		continent as string,
		population as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> sourceLookupData
sourcecasesanddeathdata filter(continent == 'Europe' && not(isNull(country_code))) ~> FilterOnlyEurope
FilterOnlyEurope select(mapColumn(
		country,
		country_code,
		continent,
		population,
		indicator,
		daily_count,
		reported_date = date,
		rate_14_day,
		source
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectCols1
SelectCols1 pivot(groupBy(country,
		country_code,
		continent,
		population,
		daily_count,
		rate_14_day,
		source),
	pivotBy(indicator),
	count = sum(daily_count),
	columnNaming: '$N$V',
	lateral: true) ~> Pivot1
Pivot1, sourceLookupData lookup(Pivot1@country == sourceLookupData@country,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
Lookup1 select(mapColumn(
		country = Pivot1@country,
		country_code,
		country_code_2_digit,
		country_code_3_digit,
		population = Pivot1@population,
		daily_count,
		rate_14_day,
		source
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectTrimCols
SelectTrimCols sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	truncate: true,
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
